title: Brokerstorm
author: Brokerstorm
content: Dear players,Brokerstorm is a unique sports betting brokerage that provides exclusive access to betting online in Asia and exchanges with best odds, highest betting limits.Winfair24 is an online betting exchange that allows users to place bets on a variety of sports and games. The site offers a wide range of betting options, including live betting, football, basketball, baseball, hockey, and more. Winfair24 also offers Cricketbook, Pinnacle,Â  Casino and high odds on all major football leagues, events, and other sports.We are glad to announce that we support all cryptocurrencies like BTC,ETH,LTC,USDT e.t.c. as payment methods. Since we have interest from our customers, we expand our crypto payments. Here is the Brokerstorm registration link: http://brokerstorm.com/registerShould you have any further concern or query please feel free to contact us. Please feel free to contact us at info@brokerstorm.comwww.brokerstorm.comFor affiliates/agent: marketing@brokerstorm.com

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Welcome to bitcointalk.To be honest, the web design looks shitty you could have looked for a more experienced web designer to do your job for you so it will be better if you work on the designs of your webpage to make it look more appealing to the eyes and also your website is lagging on mobile phone so you might want to also make it more mobile friendly.Secondly, I found a "dot(.)net" domain; do you guys still own the .net domain or is it a for an imposter? Because I found out that both the "dot(.)com" and "dot(.)net" were using the same license.

comments.author: tusandii
comments.body: Welcome to the bitcointalk OP forum.Are you a representative of the sites you offer here?First, if you want to create an ANN thread and promote a gambling site, you must have a copper membership, friend.Maybe this is the first time you have entered the forum so you don't understand the uses and benefits of copper membership. I hope that in the future you can buy copper membership to promote your site.I see your site provides a lot of options and features which are pretty good.But for the promotion board here it is still bad and it is better to change it to give users more interest.

comments.author: MainIbem
comments.body: If this is your first time to post here, I will advise your increase the quality of your post and make this thread looks very presentable to the reader, to me it doesn't carry the load it should be having.Anyway i think that is the level of your strength and exposure, why not look for a better manager to create a good quality ANN thread for your project or you may get copper member rank as few person's already suggested above.

comments.author: notocactus
comments.body: Follow this topic Newbies can now pay a small fee to enable images to buy a Copper membership. Buy it with this link https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=credit;promoteThen you will be able to post and display graphic images in your posts. That is important for an announcement thread of your service.Quote from: theymos on November 11, 2017, 06:01:16 AMOnce you have it, you get the choice:If you need to hire a pro designer for your announcement thread, check in [Overview] Bitcointalk Services from Bitcointalk Members

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: Hey OP, Maybe you should include the restricted country on your services. I received access denied result when I click the link you provided when I try to visit your services. This is the first time to encounter my country being restricted on an online casino since we have an open law for online casino. I wonder whatâ€™s license you are using or what country you are based for my country get denied.Iâ€™m sure other countries will be restricted too since my country is not available, BTW Iâ€™m from SEA so Iâ€™m confused on this restriction.Buy a copper member to remove the restrictions of your account for posting images.

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.body: Welcome to the forum, it's nice to see anyone promoting online betting sites well in this forum without having to create a spam thread, maybe other friends have recommended becoming a copper member because that's to add an image design to this thread to make it look neater and more attractive get traffic from this forum to your site. I just visited your site using my mobile browser and haven't seen much on itI only see payments for cryptos like bitcoin and no options for other cryptos like litecoin, dogecoin , ethereum and others but would love to add other cryptos to make it easier for users to test play your site and make deposits, btw I think you should answer @Cantsay's question because of the importance of confirming the main domain as there are 2 active domains .net and .com of your site, at least we know which one is real and fake to prevent confusion as well as fraud.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Access denied my location is restricted so I cannot make a review on their platform, I prefer casinos to block countries that are on their restricted list so people will not make a mistake of joining and playing.Like all the others I also recommend that OP get a Copper account, take a visit to the other casino thread, and see their designs, show them that you are dedicated to promoting your casino here and we have a lot of good designers to make your thread stand out and looks professional.I also recommend that you remain active here to answer all questions and check other recommendations on how you can effectively promote your casino here.

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: Quote from: Brokerstorm on April 23, 2023, 07:43:30 AMBrokerstorm is a unique sports betting brokerage that provides exclusive access to betting online in Asia and exchanges with best odds, highest betting limits.Previously I had seen the Brokerstorm site running at SBRforum.com, there were members who complained and lost money there, because of bets.Proof:[RESOLVED] â‚¬75,000 confiscated by Brokerstorm / WhitehorseElsewhere I have also seen users of the Brokerstorm site having problems and complaining about losing money too.Proof:Brokerstorm SCAM(?) - over 3000 EUR disappear from my account on Orbit Exchange.QuoteBe very careful if you want to use this agent's services. They offer Betfair games through various sites like Whitehorse, Orbit Exchange, Fair Exchange and others. As long as I was winning little money, there was no major withdrawal problem, but I won several thousand euros in the last few months and my account was suspended. Their claim is that it is Betfair's decision (odds manipulation). Obviously, this is a pack of lies because my bets were 100% fair and all my problems with the Brokerstorm started when I tried to withdraw part of my money.Below I am presenting my correspondence with Brokerstorm:What is certain is that I am very anti-gambling/betting sites that are just starting out here, of course we don't want to get stuck after using the Brokerstorm site.Why are there so many complaints of loss outside about Brokerstorm, are you here with the same mission and vision.

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: I confess that I am not a person with a broad understanding of how Betting Broker works in practice in relation to the TOS of casinos, especially currently with the KYC issue, so I hope you understand me if I say something wrong, correct me if I do is wrong: Betting Broker creates accounts in several casinos, right? then people create an account at Betting Broker then people deposit money on the Betting Broker website to place bets on games with the best odds and without bet limits and Betting Broker takes that money and bets on the casino with the best odds, and that's how it works does it work right?as i said i am not someone with knowledge of how exactly Betting Broker is even searching on google and my theory at least from what i could conclude from google and what i just mentioned, but my question is if Betting Broker is not against the TOS of casinos? because in practice the Betting Broker creates an account in a casino but who will be using the account are many other people, shouldn't that be wrong and against the TOS of all casinos?And what about the KYC issue? does the Betting Broker do KYC at the casino? I imagine that the Betting Broker keeps the account bonus because as the Betting Broker creates the account, the benefits of the VIP account are all with the Betting Broker. so how can this be of benefit to people who use Betting Broker instead of creating an account in person at the casino? I imagine they say things like anonymity and no limitations, but is that really worth it?

comments.author: Kakmakr
comments.body: Wow, this site needs a lot of attention... it is very basic and I know there are incredible developers in India, so I doubt if this was done professionally. I do not know if this was a old Fiat based site that just added Crypto currencies.. or if this was a newly designed Crypto gambling site.Â   I hope the .net site are not a phishing site... so please be careful not navigating there and losing all your money. Also, check out the complaints about this site... just google Brokerstorm + complaints.

comments.author: Brokerstorm
comments.body: Hello to everyone, Your opinions matter to us and your feedback is used to review and improve the services we offer.I am a representative of Brokerstorm Betting Broker and I would be happy to answer any of your questions.@cantsay both domains are fully legit and licensed under the same Curacao license ( all required information are described on website), the domain brokerstorm.net serve clients from LatinAmerica countries and the site is translated into Portuguse and Spanish.@YOSHIE both cases have been resolved from our relevant team. Keep in mind that there are similar complaints with another betting brokers in the past, this does not make a licensed Betting Broker illegal or scam.

comments.author: AmoreJaz
comments.body: Quote from: Brokerstorm on April 24, 2023, 06:53:26 PMHello to everyone, Your opinions matter to us and your feedback is used to review and improve the services we offer.I am a representative of Brokerstorm Betting Broker and I would be happy to answer any of your questions.@cantsay both domains are fully legit and licensed under the same Curacao license ( all required information are described on website), the domain brokerstorm.net serve clients from LatinAmerica countries and the site is translated into Portuguse and Spanish.@YOSHIE both cases have been resolved from our relevant team. Keep in mind that there are similar complaints with another betting brokers in the past, this does not make a licensed Betting Broker illegal or scam.you can always read the feedbacks of the people here and see some good insights. who knows it can truly improve your services and may possibly attract more users. by the way, since not many gamblers in the forum are not using a betting brokerage platform, what do you think will give them a try for your services? what is your selling point for them to explore your site and see what's in store for them?

comments.author: Brokerstorm
comments.body: Winfair24 is powered by Betfair also it is built for professional bettors, like value or arbitrage bettors, but any kind of bettor can take advantage of ps3838 and the betting exchange offered on Winfair24. Winfair24 offers Cricketbook, Pinnacle â€“ Ps3838, Casino and high odds as well as Cashout on major football leagues, events, and other sports. The Minimum stake is 6E and the commission is 3% on winnings.-Brokerstorm is arbitrage friendly - Long term winners are welcome!-There are NO fees on deposits besides Bank deposits where a fee of 5E applies for amounts under 1000E.-Free transfers between betting accounts-Mobile friendly versionVarious payment methods are available: Skrill, MuchBetter, Astropay, Bank transfer and Cryptos are all accepted at Brokerstorm with a huge variety of cryptocurrencies such as Tether, Litecoin, Bitcoin, Etheruem etc.No restrictions on winnings Accounts- Brokerstorm advantage!We welcome winning punters! Many betting companies restrict the accounts of punters who are successful and win more often than they lose. We do not do that! We will not limit or restrict any account if it is winning, on the contrary we will continue to give a platform to keep winning.Please feel free to contact us at info@brokerstorm.com

The competition is high so if you can not stay in the race then it's difficult for you gain a trust and benefit from the community. comments.body: QuoteACCESS DENIEDThe page that you are trying to access has been restricted in this location due to its regulatory rules. We apologize for any inconveniencei am from Asia but i'm not able to access the site. not using VPN nor TOR but it's still not showing.is Winfair24 a partner with brokerstorm?

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: First of all, welcome to the forum..I am still trying to understand what the link is between brokerstorm and winfair24,, like you explained, brokerstorm Is broker company while winfair24 is a casino, I am guessing that the broker company and the Casino are not owned and operated by one body, what exactly does the broker company do for the casino.?And to add, I will suggest you buy a copper membership, so as to enable you be able to post images, this ability will be helpful for you to create a better Ann design like other professional business here do.

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: Fivestar4everMVP on April 24, 2023, 08:58:38 PMI am still trying to understand what the link is between brokerstorm and winfair24,, like you explained, brokerstorm Is broker company while winfair24 is a casino, In my understanding Betting brokers or Betting agents are a person or a company. They act the same way as an affiliate for a casino or sportsbook, brings clients.But they have special deal or deals with with one of more gambling companies. The difference with a betting agent over an affiliate is they do the bet and all sorts of things on behalf of the clients. So you basically deposit money to them and they use your money to bet. This is a rough understanding that I was able to learn from the past as in few occasions I had offers for myself.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinGirl.Club on April 24, 2023, 09:10:25 PMQuote from: Fivestar4everMVP on April 24, 2023, 08:58:38 PMI am still trying to understand what the link is between brokerstorm and winfair24,, like you explained, brokerstorm Is broker company while winfair24 is a casino, In my understanding Betting brokers or Betting agents are a person or a company. They act the same way as an affiliate for a casino or sportsbook, brings clients.But they have special deal or deals with with one of more gambling companies. The difference with a betting agent over an affiliate is they do the bet and all sorts of things on behalf of the clients. So you basically deposit money to them and they use your money to bet. This is a rough understanding that I was able to learn from the past as in few occasions I had offers for myself.Wow, this is like the first time I am getting to learn about such, so there are actually, agents a gambler could send money to, and they do the betting and all of that for the gambler?This is simply amazing though. I just can't bring myself to find a reason or understand why I would ever need body else to do my gambling for me., no matter how rich I am, with the level of risk involved with gambling, I wonder how the agents will explain to their client that they've lost all their money when such a thing occurs.Anyways, Its a good feature to have.

Whatâ€™s the assurance of this brokerage? My main concern is actually about the brokerage because I donâ€™t see this as a safe platform in crypto where you can just gamble on your own using your own money.
